mapper.select: SELECT membership, m.userId, nickName, userName, pwd, stateCode, join_date, edit_date, last_date FROM member m JOIN member_detail md ON m.userId = md.userId WHERE m.userId = #{userId} AND stateCode = 0
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET last_date = SYSDATE, failure_cnt = 0 WHERE userId = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member(userId, pwd, stateCode, join_date, edit_date, last_date, failure_cnt) VALUES(#{userId},#{pwd}, 0, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, 0)

INSERT INTO member_detail(userId, nickName, tel, membership, birth, zip_code, addr1, addr2, schoolCode, codeChange_Cnt, questCount, lottoUse,userName) VALUES(#{userId}, #{nickName}, #{tel}, 1, #{birth}, #{zip_code}, #{addr1}, #{addr2}, #{schoolCode}, 0, 0, 0,#{userName})
mapper.select: SELECT m.userId, pwd, stateCode, join_date, edit_date, last_date, failure_cnt ,nickName, tel, membership, birth, zip_code, addr1, addr2, schoolCode, codeChange_Cnt, questCount, lottoUse FROM member m JOIN member_detail d ON d.userId = m.userId WHERE m.userId = #{userId}
